sentences.translation: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.sentence: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.

sentences.translation: 马丁•路德•金遇刺后，黑人领袖变得更为激进了。

sentences.sentence: Even now we could not be sure that the militants would not find some new excuse to call a strike the following winter.
sentences.translation: 即使到现在，我们也不能确定这些激进分子不会找到某个新的借口在下一年冬天号召一场罢工。

sentences.translation: 她打开顶灯，环视这间小屋。

sentences.sentence: Why you let her talk you into doing such a foolish thing is beyond my comprehension (= impossible for me to understand ) .
sentences.translation: 你怎么会被她说服去做这种蠢事，我实在是无法理解。

sentences.translation: 很多电视广告瞄准了易受影响的幼儿。

translations.translation: 完整无缺的； 未经触动的； 未受损伤的

sentences.sentence: Only the medieval tower had remained intact.
sentences.translation: 只有这座中世纪塔楼保存完好。

sentences.sentence: His reputation survived intact.
sentences.translation: 他的声望丝毫未受影响。

sentences.sentence: The new cancer drug is a revolutionary breakthrough.

sentences.translation: 在过去的10年中，青少年在总人口中所占的比重下降了1/5。

军队， 兵力； 暴力， 武力； 力， 力气； 影响力， 效力

sentences.sentence: Westerly gales forced the ship off course.
sentences.translation: 强劲的西风将那艘船吹离了航道。

sentences.translation: 冲进大楼的消防队员被火焰挡了回来。

sentences.translation: 她不想打开门，但那男人硬是把它推开了。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.translation: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.sentence: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.translation: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

sentences.translation: 吉尔冲上前把他从火边拉开。

sentences.translation: 她狡猾地斜瞟了布莱威尔一眼。

sentences.sentence: Water poured through the hole, saturating the carpet.
sentences.translation: 水从洞里流进来，浸湿了地毯。

translations.translation: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片

sentences.sentence: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.

sentences.sentence: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.translation: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.sentence: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.translation: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.sentence: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.translation: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.sentence: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.translation: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.sentence: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.translation: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

sentences.sentence: ...a rectangular table.
sentences.translation: …一张长方形的桌子。

translations.translation: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的

sentences.translation: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.sentence: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.translation: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

translations.translation: 反对， 异议； 反对的理由

sentences.sentence: Her objection was that he was too young.
sentences.translation: 她反对的理由是他太小。

sentences.sentence: our planet’s precious resources

sentences.translation: 诉讼中说，是石油公司策划了20世纪70年代的油荒。

sentences.sentence: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.translation: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.translation: 该测试将评估能力而不是学业成绩。

sentences.translation: 没有人和我提过什么公文包。

sentences.translation: 丹尼斯窥视着房间里的一举一动，只见她从公文包里拿出一个红色的小东西，快速地把它藏在梳妆台最底下的抽屉里。

sentences.translation: 他喝醉时会是一个有点令人讨厌的人。

sentences.sentence: They set off at a brisk pace .
sentences.translation: 他们踏着轻快的步伐上路了。

sentences.translation: 在袍子腰处束了根细绳。

sentences.translation: 他从他的包里掏出炸药和一些乱糟糟的绳子。

sentences.translation: 选举欺诈

sentences.translation: 她被判犯有诈骗罪。

sentences.translation: 该党重申其核裁军承诺。

sentences.translation: 阳光下河面波光粼粼。

sentences.translation: 本次航班飞往开罗。

sentences.sentence: {"COLLOINEXA":["sexual repression"]}
sentences.translation: 性压抑

sentences.sentence: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.translation: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.sentence: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.translation: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.sentence: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.translation: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

sentences.translation: 莱夫卡斯有葱郁茂盛的植被。

sentences.sentence: Hopes of economic recovery are fading.
sentences.translation: 经济复苏的希望越来越渺茫。

sentences.sentence: Mr Braley has been made aware of the need for absolute secrecy.
sentences.translation: 布雷利先生被告知需要绝对保密。

sentences.sentence: As you are aware, a fee will be charged annually.
sentences.translation: 正如你所知道的那样，每年都要收取一笔费用。

sentences.sentence: The guardian found a quarterly quart of quartz in the safeguard.
sentences.translation: 监护人在安全装置内找到了四分之一夸脱石英。

sentences.sentence: The quarrelsome general quarreled about a quarter quart of oil in the headquarters.
sentences.translation: 好争持的将军正在司令部为四分之一夸脱油而争持。

sentences.sentence: Use warm water and baking soda solution about a tablespoon (15ml) of baking soda to a quart (1 liter) of water. This both cleans and neutralizes odors. Rinse and wipe dry.
sentences.translation: 使用温水和碳酸氢钠溶液，其配比为一大汤勺（15毫升）碳酸氢钠比一夸脱（1升）水。这会清洁并中和异味。用清水冲洗，擦干。

translations.translation: 安全， 保障； 抵押品； 证券

sentences.sentence: Parenting is about giving your child security and love.
sentences.translation: 养育儿女就是要给他们保护和爱。

sentences.sentence: Workers want greater job security (= not being in danger of losing your job ) .
sentences.translation: 工人们希望有更多的工作保障。

sentences.sentence: This insurance plan offers your family financial security in the event of your death.
sentences.translation: 这份保险能在你死后给你的家人提供经济保障。

translations.translation: 授予， 给予； 判给， 裁定

sentences.sentence: The movie has won a number of awards.
sentences.translation: 该片获得了多个奖项。

sentences.sentence: an award-winning restaurant
sentences.translation: 获奖餐厅

sentences.sentence: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.translation: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.sentence: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.translation: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.sentence: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.translation: 精密的警报系统

translations.translation: 虚弱的， 衰弱的， 无力的； 无效的， 无益的

sentences.sentence: His voice sounded feeble and far away.
sentences.translation: 他的声音听上去既无力又遥远。

sentences.sentence: She was too feeble to leave her room.
sentences.translation: 她身体虚弱，无法走出自己的房间。

translations.translation: 估计， 估量； 评价

sentences.sentence: What is needed in such cases is a calm appraisal of the situation.
sentences.translation: 在此类情况下需要的是对形势的冷静估计。

sentences.sentence: five weeks of continual rain
sentences.translation: 持续了五个星期的降雨

sentences.sentence: the Japanese business philosophy of continual improvement
sentences.translation: 日本人精益求精的经营哲学

translations.translation: 随心所欲的； 专断的

sentences.sentence: an arbitrary decision
sentences.translation: 武断的决定

sentences.sentence: the arbitrary arrests of political opponents
sentences.translation: 对政敌的任意逮捕

sentences.sentence: Kathy seems to take a very passive role in the relationship.
sentences.translation: 凯茜在这一关系中似乎扮演着十分被动的角色。

sentences.sentence: their passive acceptance of their fate
sentences.translation: 他们对命运的消极接受

sentences.sentence: The war and the corresponding fall in trade have had a devastating effect on the country.
sentences.translation: 战争以及由此所导致的贸易量下降对这个国家产生了致命的影响。

translations.translation: 条约， 协议， 协定

sentences.sentence: Both sides have agreed to sign the treaty .
sentences.translation: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.sentence: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.
sentences.translation: 该和平条约结束了将近四年的暴力。
